Projects.title: AI Automation Platform
desc: An advanced AI automation platform built with Python and LangChain, featuring agentic AI workflows and RAG capabilities. The platform integrates with Amazon Bedrock and GCP AI Platform to provide intelligent automation solutions.

The system implements sophisticated AI agents that can handle complex workflows, process natural language queries, and provide context-aware responses using retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques.
Integrated with N8n for workflow automation, the platform offers seamless API integrations with services like Stripe, ElevenLabs, and Airtable.

Projects.title: Cloud Infrastructure Manager
desc: A comprehensive cloud infrastructure management solution built with .NET and C#, providing automated deployment and monitoring capabilities across Google Cloud Platform.
The application features real-time monitoring, automated scaling, and intelligent resource allocation using cloud-native technologies and best practices.
Includes integration with CI/CD pipelines, automated testing frameworks, and comprehensive logging and alerting systems.

Projects.title: Test Automation Framework
desc: An enterprise-grade test automation framework built with Selenium, Robot Framework, and SpecFlow for comprehensive end-to-end testing.
The framework supports multiple browsers, parallel execution, and generates detailed test reports with screenshots and videos for failed tests.
Integrated with Jenkins for continuous testing and includes custom test libraries for common testing scenarios, API testing capabilities with Postman collections, and database validation features.

Projects.title: API Integration Hub
desc: A centralized API integration hub that provides unified access to multiple third-party services including Stripe for payments, ElevenLabs for voice synthesis, and various data sources.
Built with modern API design principles, featuring GraphQL and REST endpoints, comprehensive API documentation with Swagger, and robust error handling and rate limiting.
The hub includes automated API testing, monitoring dashboards, and webhook management for real-time event processing.

Projects.title: TestNexus
desc: TestNexus is a comprehensive unified testing framework designed to streamline all aspects of software quality assurance. Supporting UI, API, performance, contract, end-to-end, and integration testing, it provides a single platform for managing your entire test suite with an intuitive dark-themed interface.

Built with containerization at its core, TestNexus spins up isolated Docker containers for each test run, ensuring clean and reproducible test environments. After execution, it automatically exports detailed reports and terminates containers to optimize resource usage - no orphaned processes or wasted compute.

The framework features real-time console output, organized test suite management, and comprehensive reporting with archived results. Whether you're running a quick API validation or a full regression suite, TestNexus handles the infrastructure so you can focus on writing better tests.
